video.title: Ice Road Truckers: Collection
video.synopsis: Hitch a ride with ice road truckers as they steer their big rigs across the frozen lakes of Canada's Northwest Territory to deliver much-needed cargo.

episodes.synopsis: A 50-ton fuel tanker flips over at the beginning of the ice road. Jay Westgard hauls three giant water purifiers to the De Beers Diamond mine.
episodes.title: The Big Chill

episodes.synopsis: Jay Westgard embarks on a trip to the De Beers mine with a 95,000-pound diamond ore scrubber.
episodes.title: Driving on Thin Ice

episodes.synopsis: It's day 37 of the ice road season, and there are almost 3,000 more loads to go. Drivers are washing out, and the road is beaten up.
episodes.title: Into the Whiteout

episodes.synopsis: It's a new season and a new set of challenges for the ice road truckers, who carry vital equipment to remote outposts.
episodes.title: Mechanical Mayhem

episodes.synopsis: Just five days into the Arctic adventure, Mother Nature is about to strike and wreak havoc on the ice roads.
episodes.title: The Big Blizzard

episodes.synopsis: When the new ice road season begins, there are 6,000 loads of freight to move in just 12 weeks to the oil camps of Alaska's North Slope.
episodes.title: Deadliest Ice Road

episodes.synopsis: A deadly combination of unpredictable weather on the North Slope has made Atigun Pass more dangerous than ever.
episodes.title: Killer Pass

episodes.synopsis: Jack is stranded by an avalanche and left helpless as he watches the DOT clean up the carnage. Ray faces the Dalton with a premonition of death.
episodes.title: Avalanche!

episodes.synopsis: It's the deadliest and most dangerous time of the year: the melt. The DOT races to stop an overflow that could take out the Dalton and its truckers.
episodes.title: Deadly Melt

episodes.synopsis: Lisa makes up for last season's failure, Dave's boss considers his future, Maya fights for a chance, and a wrong turn forces Rick to drive in reverse.
episodes.title: Wrong Turn & Burned

episodes.synopsis: Warm weather, dangerous road conditions and polar bears hinder the season's final deliveries, Dave loses his job and Lisa safely delivers her cargo.
episodes.title: Judgement Day

episodes.synopsis: As a storm hits, Jack's trailer breaks down, Austin makes a rash mistake, and Rick and Hugh attempt a dangerous trip to a remote village.
episodes.title: No Way Out

episodes.synopsis: A discovery takes Rick's truck off the road, Alex risks his life hauling overweight cargo on the ice, and Harry and Lane fill in for a missing Jack.
episodes.title: Hard Road Ahead

episodes.synopsis: When Hugh and Vlad set up a competing company, Polar Industries retaliates by hiring Hugh's biggest rivals, while Hugh's new driver gets in trouble.
episodes.title: Collision Course

episodes.synopsis: VP agrees to give Art one more chance but also brings on another trucker. At Polar, Alex and Lisa deliver, and Darrell makes a risky decision.
episodes.title: Fear The Crack
